name: Market Immersion
overview: Every meeting is engaging and an eye-opening experience. This is a diverse group of entrepreneurs with a large knowledge base. Attendees are well-versed in internet marketing/social media; some are novices that are equally as important and fit in perfectly. It is never uncomfortable to ask questions or solicit opinions. The group is open to all levels of learning. When you ask for advice, you receive good solid suggestions. Many implement the information they gained immediately, tweaking it to match their style and industry. Group members are genuinely interested in sharing and are supportive of all businesses represented in this group. Traversing the road of social media marketing has been much less intimidating, not to mention fun, since this group convened, March, 2009.
